data.enText: a time of great danger, difficulty or confusion when problems must be solved or important decisions must be made

data.chText: 这家公司虽然仍处于危机之中，但已经挺过了经济衰退最严重的日子。
data.enText: The business is still in crisis but it has survived the worst of the recession.

data.chText: 执政党当时正面临着自身认同的危机。
data.enText: The ruling party was facing an identity crisis .

data.chText: 我们对处于困境的家庭提供帮助。
data.enText: We provide help to families in crisis situations.

data.chText: 在危难关头我知道能投靠哪些朋友。
data.enText: In times of crisis I know which friends I can turn to.

data.chText: 当时这个政党在其支持者中正遭受信任危机。
data.enText: The party was suffering a crisis of confidence among its supporters (= they did not trust it any longer) .
a time when a problem, a bad situation or an illness is at its worst point

data.chText: 他们的婚姻已到了危机的地步。
data.enText: Their marriage has reached crisis point.
The fever has passed its crisis.

simple_means.memory_skill: cris 判断，分辨 + is 表情况 → 需要做出判断的时刻 → 危机时刻

ex.chText: 这个新生的国家目前正面临一场经济危机。。
ex.enText: This newly founded country now faces an economic crisis.

ex.chText: 美国的汽车工业现正处于危机之中。
ex.enText: The American car industry is now in crisis.

ex.chText: 在危难时刻，你就会知道谁是你真正的朋友。
ex.enText: In time of crisis, you will find out who your real friend is.

synonyms.bx: 指国家、经济等所遭遇的充满巨大风险的紧急关头，或个人情感和境况的危急时刻。

ex.chText: 遇到紧急情况时，击碎玻璃并摁下按钮。
ex.enText: In case of emergency, break the glass and press the button.

ex.chText: 在紧急情况下，保持镇静至关重要。
ex.enText: It is vital to stay calm in an emergency.

synonyms.bx: 多指突发的危险情况或事故。

tr: a crucial stage or turning point in the course of something
example: after the crisis the patient either dies or gets better

tr: an unstable situation of extreme danger or difficulty
example: they went bankrupt during the economic crisis

value.def: A crisis is a situation in which something or someone is affected by one or more very serious problems.

example.ex: Natural disasters have obviously contributed to the continent's economic crisis...
example.tran: 很显然，自然灾害也是造成该大陆经济危机的原因之一。

example.ex: The Italian political system has been judged to be in terminal crisis for decades.
example.tran: 人们认为意大利的政治体系几十年来一直存在着严重危机。
孩子生病或其他家庭危机

example.ex: ...someone to turn to in moments of crisis.
example.tran: 危急时刻可以求助的人

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to judge, to discern 判断, 分辨
rootsaffixes.title: crit, cris

partsOfSpeech.dec: cris 判断，分辨 + is 表情况 → 需要做出判断的时刻 → 危机时刻
crit 判断，分辨 + er 表名词 + ion 表名词 → 做出判断的依据 → 标准
crit 判断，分辨 + ical …的 → 危急时刻分辨好坏的 → 危急的
crit 判断，分辨 + ic …的 + ism 表名词 → 批评
hypo 下 + cris 判断，分辨 + y 表名词 →〔当面不说〕下面批评 → 伪善
ana 在旁边 + lys 分解 + is 性质，情况 → 在旁边分解 → 分析
bas 基础 + is 性质，情况 → 基础
cris 判断 + is 性质，情况 → 需做出紧急判断 → 危机
epi 在…上 + derm 皮肤 + is 性质，情况 → 表皮，外皮
thes 放 + is 性质，情况 → 放好的研究主题 → 命题
